text: is a Japanese city in Ōita Prefecture on the island of Kyushu.Deal, William E. (2005). Handbook to Life in Medieval and Early Modern Japan, p. 80. ==History== Usa grew up around Usa Shrine which was established in the 8th century.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2002).
